text: 21.42: Sng 118.22-23 naŋga, Ais 28.16 naŋga, Mk 12.10 naŋga, Sɨ 4.11 naŋga, Ro 9.33 naŋga, Ef 2.20 naŋga, 1 Pi 2.6-8Kamavahu Jisas nurɨŋ nɨmavamba kitɨhumi, Narɨ Gotɨndu aŋgwɨmɨkɨyɨ kuyu mandambu nɨŋu ŋgatɨŋgɨruta mambaha ŋgamara. Kuyu kandɨha ambami, Tɨmba tavɨ tɨhutɨhu haŋɨnɨŋ ñamba vata tɨvɨmbu tamamu. Tɨmba kandɨha tɨhu tavɨ tapa mɨŋahandahandandu tɨmba avi ŋandi kɨyɨ. Aru hama nuŋambi kandɨhɨm ha andɨhi yɨvurahahi ara ŋgaharɨŋ avindɨmbanzɨkwɨ kɨyɨ, vamba ambami.
